page.title: 13OLD AND YOUNG IN EAST COKER
page.content:
The{"Time to Share"}club is for all ages,mainly people{over 60.}They meet every fortnight on a Monday afternoon. About 80 people belong to the club but the average number of people attending meetings is about 40.They go on outings such as the theatre;they also have skittles,craft exhibitions, whist drives,competitions and have a speaker or an activity.Next year they are planning a holiday in Scotland.There are many 70 year olds who are very active.
People of{pre-school age}are not forgotten either.The{play group}meets regularly at the Playing field Pavilion;the{Mums and Toddlers Group meet at the village hall.
There is something for everyone in the area-see the next page also.
